price: 84. Sungguh, Kami telah memberi kedudukan kepadanya di bumi, dan Kami telah memberikan jalan kepadanya (untuk mencapai) segala sesuatu,
arabic: إِنَّا مَكَّنَّا لَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ مِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ سَبَبٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innā makkannā lahu fī al-arḍi waātaynāhu min kulli shayin sababan
